snippet: John Edwards is opening a new law practice. | The Justice Department is set to announce the final details of a $13 billion settlement with JPMorgan Chase. | Dropbox is seeking $250 million in financing. | Timothy F. Geithner’s new job presents less...
abstract: John Edwards is opening a new law practice. | The Justice Department is set to announce the final details of a $13 billion settlement with JPMorgan Chase. | Dropbox is seeking $250 million in financing. | Timothy F. Geithner’s new job presents less of a conflict than many critics claim.
